workat.title: Hi there, I'm Priyank!
content:
I am Project Manager at Intellial, based in India.

I have joined Intellial in 2011.

aboutWork.title: What I do at Intellial?
content: Involvement in Database design and defining application architecture.
Involvement in development of the core framework to increase faster development.
Planning, executing, monitoring, controlling, and delivering projects on time.
Communicating with Business Analysts, Client, and Developers and make sure to keep everybody on the same page.

currentWork.title: What am I currently working on?
content: On ERP Product which is specially targeted for Electronics and High Tech Manufacturing industry

weekness.title: Soemthing Bad About Me
content: Can't see bad indentation code, illogical variable, and function name, and spending most of my time suggesting it.
I don't like to reply when someone just sends 'HI' and wait for the response.
